## Balance Issue
Describe the balance problem you've noticed.

## Game Area
What aspect of the game is affected?
- [ ] Combat (damage, hit chance, etc.)
- [ ] Economy (gold income/expenses)
- [ ] Gladiator Stats/Classes
- [ ] Building Costs/Benefits
- [ ] Staff Effectiveness
- [ ] Fame/Reputation
- [ ] Difficulty Scaling
- [ ] Other

## Current State
Describe how the mechanic currently works and why it feels unbalanced.

## Impact
How does this imbalance affect gameplay?
- [ ] Makes the game too easy
- [ ] Makes the game too hard
- [ ] Makes a strategy/option useless
- [ ] Makes a strategy/option overpowered
- [ ] Creates exploits

## Suggested Fix
What change would you suggest to improve balance?

## Game Progress
At what stage of the game did you notice this?
- [ ] Early game (Days 1-20)
- [ ] Mid game (Days 21-50)
- [ ] Late game (Days 50+)
- [ ] All stages

## Difficulty Setting
What difficulty were you playing on?
- [ ] Easy
- [ ] Normal
- [ ] Hard

## Additional Context
Any other information that might help us understand and fix the balance issue.
